channel.title: George Bush: Hates rap music?
channel.description:
[quote="Chris Rock"]Ok, for starters, Tupac Shakur was shot on the Las Vegas strip after a Mike Tyson match, not a side street. And more people saw Tupac die then watched the match itself, for a court to be raised you need only 7 witnesses. Tupac didnt even have a investigation carried out when he died, not even a chalk line. So George Bush manages to find Sudam Hussein in a hole in Iraq, but cant say who shot Tupac? Tupac died in Vegas on the strip![/quote]
Plus all the good rappers get killed, and you know what? No rock stars have got killed. So in the U.S. is rap killing regarded as legal? Tupac didnt even get a chalk line! Isn't that saying something?

item.title: George Bush: Hates rap music?

[quote=“ThugLife, post:47, topic:142582”][quote author=killerman93 link=topic=195030.msg1757840#msg1757840 date=1189875646]
How did this topic get into Tupacs life story anyway?
It was about Bush hating rap.
[/quote]
But what you provided was false information.
Since you mentioned tupac in the first post… thats how it went into it.[/quote]

Okay

item.title: George Bush: Hates rap music?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:39, topic:142582”]Having a bad childhood influences later life.
Pscyhcologists have said. :rolleyes:[/quote]

No people said he did the wrong thing going with death row, people say he would be still alive if he didnt go with death row.
He got in with the wrong crowd, as suge knight was heavily involved with some bloods gang or something like that.

Mopman:

But, he was rapping about how people could break through that shit and be good people, no matter what had happened to them in the past, he was rapping about how much bullshit there was in the world. Then, after he got out the studio, he’d go out and cause some.

What are you basing this one?
Watch some of the Thugs angel, or resurection videos on youtube, accounts of what he done from his friends points of view the people who knew what he did.

item.title: George Bush: Hates rap music?
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:33, topic:142582”][quote author=jason_x link=topic=195030.msg1756459#msg1756459 date=1189814469]
But who cares rappers are ignorant and think the best way to m,easure a man is the size of his rims…
[/quote]
No, the NEW gay rappers do that, the older rappers wasnt into all this baggy clothes shit, Big rims, neons glows and huge sound systems, they had nice cars but they didnt kit them out with rubbish.

@Mopman, i hope you are not talking about some of the later stuff he released where it was all that ‘fuck you all’ stuff, because thats what he had to do because of what suge knight asked him to do, Suge knight made him sign a contract with him on death row in exchange for bailing 2pac out of jail.

Name me some rappers that would do songs like


http://www.azlyrics.com/lyrics/2pac/brendasgotababy.html
and there are the lyrics.[/quote]

Poor brenda

[Quote author=2pac]She tried to hide her pregnancy, from her family
Who didn’t really care to see, or give a damn if she
Went out and had a church of kids
As long as when tha check came they got first dibs[/quote]

Mopman:

No, I was talking more about the fact that his lifestyle didn’t match up with what he sung about. Going around in groups beating on random people is not helping the world.

Yeah but he had a crap childhood.

[Quote author=2pac]When I was young, me and my mama had beef
17 years old kicked out on tha streets
though back in tha time, I never thought I’d see her face
ain’t a woman alive that can take my mommas place
suspended from school, scared ta go home
I was a fool with tha big boys breaking all tha rules
shed tears with my baby sister
over tha years we wuz poorer than tha other little kids
and even though we had different dadies
tha same drama when things went wrong we blamed mama
I reminised on tha stress I caused, it wuz hell
hugg’en on my mama from a jail cell[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: George Bush: Hates rap music?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:31, topic:142582”][quote author=jason_x link=topic=195030.msg1756459#msg1756459 date=1189814469]
But who cares rappers are ignorant and think the best way to m,easure a man is the size of his rims…
[/quote]

No they are not:

[Quote author=2pac Ft.Elton John]i stop and stare at the younger, my heart goes to’em
They tested, it was stressed that fate under
In our days, things changed
Everyone’s ashamed to the youth cuz the truth looks strange
And for me it’s the worst, we left of a world that’s cursed, and it hurts
cause any day they’ll push the button
and yall condemned like Malcolm x and Bobby Hunton, died for nothin
Don’t them let me get teary, the world looks dreary
but when you wipe your eyes, see it clearly
there’s no need for you to fear me
if you take the time to hear me, maybe you can learn to cheer me
it aint about black or white, cuz we’re human
I hope you see the light before its ruined
my ghetto gospel.[/quote]
[/quote]

What a shame he was a hypocrite who didn’t live up to his own ideals.

Read full topic
